name: Retro Invaders 3D
description:
I originally made this for the "My First Game Jam 2023" Game Jam, but deadlines tend to be overlooked. So I took the time and improved, and that's the final result.

All art was hand-made using built-in Unreal Engine tools.

 As for the music: Some of it was also custom-made using beepbox.co, except for a few sounds taken from free sound packs from itch.io.

 The main theme: Abstraction - Three Red Hearts - Pixel War 1.

Let me know it there's something wrong with the game, I might fix it!

Hope you enjoy!
